website_summaries.verdict: With 6 mini plush toys and fun sounds, this claw machine has features kids love.
pros: Makes sounds reminiscent of an arcade
We love the 6 adorable fruit-shaped plush toys that come with it
cons: Coins occasionally get stuck in the coin slot

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to present this gift to my kids this holiday!! The lights and sounds make it really exciting!! I noticed that the new model has a volume control feature which is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kay

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT for one day, then nothing
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted a claw machine forever. Santa brought him this one for Christmas. It worked GREAT for all of Christmas day. He said it was the best present ever. On day two it wouldn't work, we replaced the batteries and nothing. We checked the batteries, tried putting in different new batteries, looked for a reset switch, nothing. If I had reviewed this yesterday, I would have said it was amazing and just what we were looking for, but now, I am definitely returning it. Unless someone has a suggestion I can try to get it going again. The toy is getting no power, none of the features work, no lights, sounds, or movement. Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: worked for 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, my daughter loved it for Christmas. It has 3 joy sticks, one stopped working after about 15 minutes of play. Now we'll have to go through the hassle of returning it, I don't know what to expect during the process, hope it goes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literal piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This junk didn't include the plush toys that were supposed to be in the box, it didn't work with the Chinese batteries it came with or with good ol' Duracell batteries when replaced, and there was no cover on the enormous battery compartment so your kids can get their hands all over the batteries. Cheap, disgusting, not worth $0.01!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Levin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work from the start
customer_reviews.text: Opened Christmas morning put name brand batteries in, and nothing! No power, broken claw machine for Christmas. I had one disappointed child.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanieware

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the volume control. I've had two machines so far and they break very quickly. The chain that connects the claw is connected by a flimsy little metal ring and the chain comes off very easily. I tried to repair it but I can't take the cover off because the screws are on too tight. You cannot reach the claw from the little opening to repair it that way either. I sent both machines back.
customer_reviews.author: Reefay

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not quite what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: This is still a fun item, but the claw moves extremely slowly. Also, the coins are hard to push into the slot, which is mitigated a bit by the fact that you really only have to push them in about a quarter inch to start your turn. Other than that, I have no complaints. It is easy to add in items to pick up, and it is easy to turn the annoying music off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farley

customer_reviews.title: so cool for the little man
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so cool, my wife bought this for our little man's 3 birthday and it is very cool and fun. It works great gives them so much fun, and is the right size for little hands. Don't get me wrong I have tried it as well to enjoy the fun. My wife did go to the dollar store to fill it up with other fun goodies. The plush toys it came with are great and the one everyone is going for. Great for parties and such. Just cool as heck
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Not a good toy choice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson. He was so excited when he opened his gift. The claw would not open or move down so he didn't even get to use it once. Very disappointing when you purchase something brand new and this happens. I had to explain that I would need to send it back and find him a different one. I will not give this one another chance by ordering the same brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Great game but came damaged and didn’t realize until it was opened as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift as a Christmas present for someone and it is a lot of fun and the kids loved it. The only thing is that the bottom of the game is cracked where the battery compartment is and that was disappointing because the game wasn’t cheap. I can’t return it at this point for a replacement because it was a gift for someone and according to the site there’s no more available.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Coins don’t activate it easily.  Hard for kids to use.
customer_reviews.text: The coins don’t activate the machine unless you press them upwards. Difficult for kids to use. Disappointing because it was a Christmas gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: LacyO

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised, but the machine stopped worked less than a month after xmas. Very disappointed. Great concept, but bad design and construction. Really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: ohlmes

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get my kids a claw machine but the reviews have not been great on other versions. This one only had 1 review when I purchased but it was a great review, so I decided to give it a try. It also had a volume control which was a big issue with other versions. My son got it last night for his 6th birthday. They've been playing with it non stop since. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nadeane

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter on her birthday we put brand new Duracell batteries in it that don't expire until 2027 and it does not work at all will be asking for a refund very disappointed little girl
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Opened Christmas morning. Got one use out of it and it won't work. Lights start to come on dim then shut off. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! My daughter got this as a gift. It was defective. Returned to Amazon, got a refund, and used the refund to buy another one. The second one was worse than the first. It was not even new! How do I know? Because it was not even packaged properly like the first one. The 6 plushies that it was supposed to come with were not there. It only provided 5 coins which was supposed to have more. The machine was defective just like the first one in that the forward backward joy stick did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K. San Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work right out of the box - very disappointing as it was part of a Xmas gift - seller didn’t even offer to send a new one
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D

customer_reviews.title: Broken Toy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT The claw machine seemed old and used. The coin box was chipped and plastic broken on the side, toys were dirty and instead of 30 coins, the box came with only 18 coins. Disappointed Customer
customer_reviews.author: Priya Guttal

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product!!!! Very cheaply made (obviously) related to cost. Up and down, east and west worked ok but north and south didn't work at all from the very beginning. I didn't feel it was worth contacting anyone so I just ate it. I would highly avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B McGeary

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 8 year old GRANDgirl’s CHRISTmas gift. let’s just say if this had been her ONLY gift...she would have been fine with it. She played with it for hours...setting up a circus (her words) for her brothers to play, too! Quite a hit I must say😄 I did buy the warrant based on reviews of other folks but it seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: GRANDshopper

customer_reviews.title: Chain broke in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Received claw machine and my 9 year old picked up one of the fruits and when she went to drop it in the hole the chain collapsed and came out the mechanism. This was only after less than 5 mins of play. This was her #1 wish list gift and was very disappointed. For months I had looked for one and made a bad move getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!!  Note - Uses D batteries!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great claw machine toy!! Super fun and works great. The only downside is that is uses D batteries and uses them up quickly. I wish this had rechargeable batteries or plugged into a wall. Otherwise love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Love

customer_reviews.title: Hard to operate and quit working
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to add toys and get set up. Also it worked briefly and quit. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gelnglitter

customer_reviews.title: The best toy ever for kids👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this, buying this saved us all the quarters we used to spend at these machines for the kids on a getaway.
customer_reviews.author: True Caller

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: Still working strong. We can put wrapped candy in it and it works.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up today and put the batteries kids were super excited and it didn’t work. Looks like it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this and I have the relief of knowing that I got the warranty for three years if anything happens mechanically to the product
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust
customer_reviews.text: This product was used and missing pieces when I purchased it new. The coins for it were in a ziplock bag and there were only 22 of them when it said on the box that it came with 30 and the 6 plush stuffed toys that were supposed to come with it were missing as well. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Gold

customer_reviews.title: Looks great....but
customer_reviews.text: The toy seemed great, but the left/right joystick never worked. No problem with forward/back or up/down. My 3 kids were very disappointed. Great idea, but unfortunately, you get what you pay for. MADE IN CHINA....was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Guzzetta

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves these for some reason, and she finds this model easy to use, and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great for birthday parties!
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a great birthday present, or even as an activity for a party, just add in some candies -- and the all the kids will love taking turns trying to "claw" as much as they can!
customer_reviews.author: Mikeam

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for kids and they still play it. A lot of guests ask about it and it's fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Khristina

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price, the claw doesn’t really grab any toys, only small plushies.
customer_reviews.author: luisa alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Fun to
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys it every time she plays with it
customer_reviews.author: SimsG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very cool toy but it doesn't work like it's supposed too. The claw will move up/down and left/right but it will not move front/back. My daughter is upset because it doesn't work. I'll be returning this asap
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Unique Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, unique gift for nieces and nephews. It’s easy for them to use and keeps the occupied. Also fun for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work like it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this product today and the crane won't go back up most of the time. My daughter is very disappointed with her present form santa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great claw machine. Excellent for eye hand coordination!
customer_reviews.text: Great little claw machine. My autistic grandson loves this. I bought the extra toys to fill it up. Helps with eye hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Bummer...
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this! Unfortunately it only worked for three months and then stopped working completely. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: karta

customer_reviews.title: A real hit
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 4 year old great nephew. He loved it and we all enjoyed watching him try to get the goodies inside. I bought the extra warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: readeybook

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr. old Great-granddaughter loves this! It is fun to play with everyone! A nice Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone. Quality better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Our niece had so much fun playing with the claw machine. And I'll admit, I had a bit of fun with it, as well. The quality and functionality was actually better than expected for three price.
customer_reviews.author: theebooth

customer_reviews.title: Children like it very much
customer_reviews.text: He was very satisfied with what he bought for the child. Thank you to the merchant and the courier.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Kalata

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 5 minutes and then stopped working. Junk from China.
customer_reviews.author: travis crisler

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: The machine has to be handled with care. It's not a toy that can be knocked around.
customer_reviews.text: The claw could be a little stronger for picking up items. Five kids are playing with the claw and so far it's still working. Just hope it keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Grest fun for the grandkids, they told me it was a great present worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun! The kids love playing this and adding in new candy and small toys to grab!
customer_reviews.author: KMFJR

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for money spent purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Malfunctioned immediately with chain on claw hanging up. Very difficult to access claw to remove plastic cover and tie holding it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Brown

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grand-daughter for Christmas. She loves it and plays it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My girls ages 7, 9 and 11 have had a ball with this...lights and music make it especially festive!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my grandsons as Christmas gift worked for about 10 minutes then quit what a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all. We put the batteries in and nothing happened. In the process of returning it
customer_reviews.author: Khrystne

customer_reviews.title: Quickly broke
customer_reviews.text: Item broke about 2 hours after it was opened and put together. Very disappointing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Item didn’t work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Total scam, tried two sets of brand new batteries and item didn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Johnelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Was kinda cheap looking. I wasnt expecting a store type machine, but I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Chain breaks easily and can't be repaired.
customer_reviews.text: This product only worked for 3 days. Very disappointed and can't return it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Genovesi

customer_reviews.title: Quality is everything
customer_reviews.text: Plastic switch broke first customer.....fun if it wasn't broken already. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: michael Candeloro

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Would give it a zero if possible. Didn’t work! Huge disappointment to my daughter!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Balmaseda

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Machine
customer_reviews.text: This Toy Grabber Machine was great and and I highly recommend it!.
customer_reviews.author: ghislaine gandarinho

customer_reviews.title: Major Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for two granddaughters for Christmas. Neither was operable after one week. Returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L.

customer_reviews.title: Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my grandaughter who is 6 years old. She loves it. She told her teacher it is the best Xmas present she received.
customer_reviews.author: parfaits mom

product_meta.title: Zvation The Claw Toy Grabber Machine with Authentic Arcade Sounds, Flashing Lights & Volume Control Switch - Electronic Carnival Crane Toy Game, Animation, Includes 6 Plush Fruits for Exciting Play
product_meta.description:
Zvation The Claw Toy Grabber Machine with Flashing Lights, Sound Control Switch and 6 Plush Fruits

Test your skills with the claw! Set you sight on a prize, use the included 30 tokens or your own pennies to activate the crane. Use the controls to move the grabbing mechanism back and forth, right and left, up and down to grab it and drop it down the chute before the music stops. Win all types of prizes. Fill the Claw with Plush Fruits (6 included), scoop candy, gum, small toys, or other prizes of your choice, a successful try is rewarded with a prize that drops out of the chute to the sound of applause, authentic music and Flashing Lights.

 Everybody wants to play some rounds, doesn't matter if young or old

 Includes: 

*Electronic Claw Toy Grabber Machine, 

*Flashing Lights, 

*Authentic Arcade Sounds, 

*Volume Control Switch (Off - Low - High), 

*30 arcade tokens, 

*6 Fruits plush.

* Requires 3 "D" batteries (not included). Measures10"L x 8"W x 13.5"H.

* Makes an Amazing and Unique Gift. Great for Birthday and Christmas parties as well as any gatherings Hours of fun

* Ages 3+
feature_bullets: HOURS OF NON STOP FUN: Kids of all ages love to crane games at supermarkets, carnivals, and fairs. You can now bring that fun to your home with the Zvation Toy Grabber Machine! Plays musical Sounds animation with flashing lights while you use the controls. Try to grab & win a plush Fruit (6 included), scoop candy, gum, small toys, or other prizes of your choice.

ENTERTAINMENT: Test your skills with the claw! Set you sight on a prize, use the included 30 tokens or your own pennies to activate the crane. Use the controls to move the grabbing mechanism back and forth, right and left, up and down to grab it and drop it down the chute before the music stops.

IMAGINATIVE PLAY: Encourage creativity, build fine motor skills, and stimulate narrative play with this super cool playset. Keep the prizes that you win, or place them back in the machine for unlimited fun!

REAL GAMING ROOM EXPERIENCE: With this classic game, a successful try is rewarded with a prize that drops out of the chute to the realistic flashing lights & sound of applause and music. The sound effects & flashing lights create an authentic carnival atmosphere!

INCLUDES – Sounds with volume control switch, 3 settings - Off - Low – High, Flashing Lights, 30 coins, 6 Plush Fruits Prizes. Can be Reused Over and Over With Toy or Candy alike - Claw measures: 13.5"H x 8"W x 10"L - Takes 3 "D" batteries (not included). – Makes a great Birthday or Christmas gift

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars154 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
